backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing their roles and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode overrides, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and root layout with header, footer, themes, and page components.
frontend/src/components/AffiliateCtaPlac: Reusable CTA card component with title, description, and disabled external link button.
frontend/src/components/CinematicHero.ts: Cinematic hero section featuring parallax video, overlays, animations, and scroll navigation.
Card component rendering destination preview with image, budget badge, tags, and link to details.
frontend/src/components/HeroLineSketchOv: Renders an SVG overlay with gradient contour lines that adapt to mobile vs desktop using a resize listener.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveIndia: Displays an India map with clickable region markers that show tooltips and scroll to corresponding sections.
frontend/src/components/MasonryGrid.tsx: Wraps children in a simple masonry-layout container.
Shows a fixed mobile bottom navigation bar with route-aware highlighting.
frontend/src/components/MotionReveal.tsx: Applies intersection‑based fade and slide‑in animations to wrapped content.
frontend/src/components/RippleButton.tsx: Extends a Button with a click ripple animation rendered via positioned spans.
Fades content during router navigation events and resets scroll on load.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Renders an image that swaps to a fallback asset on load error based on aspect ratio.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Provides a multi-column footer with branding, navigation links, and copyright.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a sticky header with scroll-aware styling, desktop and mobile navigation, and theme toggling.
frontend/src/components/SocialProofGalle: Creates a horizontally scrolling gallery of user images styled as polaroids.
frontend/src/components/TagChip.tsx: Displays a tag label with an associated icon and themed styling.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Provides a dropdown button to switch between light, dark, and system themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/TrustBadges.tsx: Renders a list of trust badges with icons and labels for verified stays, budget, and local insight.
frontend/src/data/destinations.ts: Exports an array of Destination objects containing detailed data for multiple North India travel spots.
frontend/src/data/destinationTypes.ts: Defines the Destination TypeScript interface describing travel destination attributes and metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context with login, logout, and stored identity handling using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntersectionReveal: Provides a hook that reveals elements when they enter the viewport using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Implements a parallax scrolling hook with motion reduction, performance checks, and transform updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook exposing the backend actor and fetch state for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, color variables, utility classes, and visual effects for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by mounting React, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Renders the blog listing page with a featured post and a grid of additional posts using cards, images, and motion effects.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post based on the route slug, using mock content and structured sections for the article.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetPage.tsx: Shows budget-based travel categories with icons, destination lists, and tips for planning affordable trips.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetPlanningPage.ts: Provides detailed budget planning categories and tips, including card-based breakdowns for different budget tiers.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Presents community-related features like sharing stories and finding travel buddies, with a notice about upcoming functionality.
frontend/src/pages/DestinationDetailPage: Displays detailed information about a destination based on slug, including hero image, snapshot info, and fallback handling if not found.
frontend/src/pages/DestinationsPage.tsx: Searchable, filterable list of destinations with budget tabs and a masonry grid of DestinationCard components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage featuring a cinematic hero, highlighted destinations, budget categories, resource links, and map/social components.
frontend/src/pages/ResourcesPage.tsx: Provides categorized resource cards linking to guides, tips, budgeting, and planning tools for travelers.
frontend/src/pages/SafetyGuidePage.tsx: Safety guide with emergency numbers and detailed cards covering health, wellness, and essential travel precautions.
frontend/src/pages/TravelTipsPage.tsx: Travel tips page offering quick tip cards and an accordion with detailed advice for offbeat travel.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and utilities with custom OKLCH variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, and pending requests for building a 50‑destination India travel guide dataset and frontend integration.
